description: {"blocks":[{"key":"49l9d","text":"This protocol delineates a comprehensive method for synthesizing and preparing Metal-Organic Framework (MOF) nanoparticles, incorporating a STING agonist (2'3'-cGAMP). The process begins with the dissolution of Zirconium(IV) Chloride Octahydrate and Benzoic Acid in Dimethylformamide (DMF), followed by the addition of Meso-Tetraphenylporphine. The mixture undergoes ultrasonic dispersion and heating to form MOFs. Subsequent centrifugation and washing steps purify the MOFs, which are then combined with the STING agonist. The protocol also details cell harvesting and lysis procedures for preparing cellular components. The final steps include the filtration and volume adjustment of the MOF, MOF+STING, and cell membrane preparations, ensuring their readiness for biological applications. This methodical approach is essential for generating functional MOF nanoparticles for use in various in vivo and in vitro studies, particularly in molecular and cellular research.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ecgb0","text":"Dimethylformamide (DMF)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5d1ne","text":"Benzoic Acid","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"brfnd","text":"Zirconium(IV) Chloride Octahydrate (ZrCl4Â·8H2O)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3mitj","text":"Meso-Tetraphenylporphine (TPP, C44H30N4O8)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5h0tt","text":"Dimethyl Silicone Oil","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5a1mm","text":"Nitrogen Dioxide (NO2)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93jvv","text":"STING Agonist (2'3'-cGAMP, Cyclic GMP-AMP Sodium Salt)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5tqj3","text":"Phosphate-Buffered Saline (PBS)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5jla0","text":"Dissolve   of Zirconium(IV) Chloride Octahydrate and   of Benzoic Acid in   of DMF to create a precursor solution.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":53,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":74,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3vfn2","text":"Employ ultrasonic dispersion to ensure complete dissolution and mixing of the solution.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e280t","text":"Introduce   of Meso-Tetraphenylporphine (TPP) to the mixture.
